title: Set Up an Automated Welcome Email
description: An email marketer needs to create an automated workflow that sends a welcome email immediately after a new user signs up.

tasks.description: Create a new automated workflow in the email marketing platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the creation of a new automation.

tasks.description: Set the trigger for the workflow to be 'When a user joins the main mailing list'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines the entry condition for the automation.

tasks.description: Select the 'Welcome Email' template to be sent as the first step in the workflow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct email to be sent.
The welcome email workflow is now live and will trigger for new subscribers.
